rules: Rule1: If the tool is available, then provided that the plant is healthy, the workshop is successful.
Rule2: Whenever the skill is acquired, it follows that if the plant is healthy, then the workshop is successful.
Rule3: Whenever the skill is practiced, then given that the plant is monitored, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Rule4: Provided that the skill is demonstrated, then whenever the plant is monitored, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Rule5: Either the skill is at expert level, or the skill is practiced, or the skill is demonstrated.
Rule6: If the plant is thriving, then the workshop is successful.
Rule7: Either the workshop is professional, or if the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is not chaotic.
Rule8: If the skill is available, then the furniture is repaired.
Rule9: Either the skill is available or the electronic device is damaged.
Rule10: Under the condition that the electronic device is damaged, then if the tool is tested, it follows that whenever the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Rule11: If the furniture is repaired, then provided that the tool is tested, it follows that if the workshop is not successful, then the plant is broken.
Rule12: Whenever the electronic device is functional, then the workshop is organized.
Rule13: Under the condition that the workshop is organized, then the plant is healthy.
Rule14: Provided that the furniture is available, then the skill is acquired.
Rule15: Either the furniture is available or the tool is available.
Rule16: If the workshop being organized does not imply the plant is thriving, then the workshop is chaotic.
facts: Fact3: The electronic device is functional.
Fact4: It is not the case that the plant is broken.
Fact5: The skill is not at expert level.
Fact6: It is not the case that the workshop is professional.
